page.original:
TABLE.EXTERNAL_VARIABLES_GET() Syntax Variable_List as C = TABLE.EXTERNAL_VARIABLES_GET( Table_Name as C [, Format as C [, Variable_Context as C ]] ) ArgumentDescription Table_NameThe name of a table. FormatA character, numeric, logical, or date data display format. Variable_ContextA definition of the variable context, such as LOCAL_VARIABLES() or GLOBAL_VARIABLES().
Description The TABLE.EXTERNAL_VARIABLES_GET() method returns a list of externally defined variables. Example
See Also Table Functions and Methods
